Class SessionState

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.SessionState
public final class SessionState extends Object
Serializable session state for persistence and recovery. Captures all necessary information to restore a session after restart.

Binary format (little-endian): 

[4 bytes] Magic: 0x4E53 5354 ("NSST")
[2 bytes] Format version
[8 bytes] Timestamp (epoch millis)
[4 bytes] Session ID
[8 bytes] Host token
[2 bytes] Client count
For each client:
  [1 byte]  Client ID
  [8 bytes] Client token
  [2 bytes] Name length
  [N bytes] Name (UTF-8)
  [8 bytes] Connected timestamp
  [1 byte]  Flags (bit 0 = isHost)
[4 bytes] Custom data length
[N bytes] Custom data
Since:
1.1
